name: SUPPORT IN TROUBLE slideshow
description:
SUPPORT IN TROUBLE slideshow

is an interactive slideshow, set to various music's and pictures of nature, that displays inspirational Bible verses that are meant to be read for support in trouble.

Taken from the Book:

PRECIOUS BIBLE PROMISES Compiled by Samuel Clarke

Chapter 2 - Promises Relating to the Troubles of Life 

Section - "SUPPORT IN TROUBLE"

Credits:

Interactive Slideshow Created by: Elijah Leon

Music's by: Kevin MacLeod from https://freepd.com/

Songs (in order):

  • Aquarium
  • Lukewarm Banjo
  • Funshine
  • Painting Room
  • Hillbilly Swing
  • The Britons
  • Pickled Pink
  • Still Pickin
  • City Sunshine 
  • Forest Frolic Loop

Pictures by: Free-Photos from https://pixabay.com/

Texts: The Holy Bible King James Version 

Made with Localized Dialogs & Cutscenes (LDC) for Unity 3D

Controls: Press Spacebar  or A button on Xbox 360 controller to Play Next Slide
